players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "Bob is dead. This is terrible. We need to figure out who did this quickly. I'm a villager and I have no special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share any information you have. Let's try to stay..."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to vote to arrest her immediately to protect the town."
You: "Alice is not the mafioso. Charlie is trying to frame me without any proof. We need to focus on real evidence, not baseless accusations."
Charlie: "Alice’s denial is expected, but I’m the detective and I have proof. If we let her go, more innocent people will die. We must vote Alice today."
You: "Alice is innocent and Charlie is lying to cover his tracks. Why would the detective accuse me without showing any evidence? We should be cautious and not rush into voting."
Diana: "Charlie claims to be the detective and accuses Alice. Alice denies it and says Charlie is lying. I don't have any information to go on. What do you all think?"

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "Bob is dead. This is terrible. We need to figure out who did this quickly. I'm a villager and I have no special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share any information you have. Let's try to stay..."
You: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to vote to arrest her immediately to protect the town."
Alice: "Alice is not the mafioso. Charlie is trying to frame me without any proof. We need to focus on real evidence, not baseless accusations."
You: "Alice’s denial is expected, but I’m the detective and I have proof. If we let her go, more innocent people will die. We must vote Alice today."
Alice: "Alice is innocent and Charlie is lying to cover his tracks. Why would the detective accuse me without showing any evidence? We should be cautious and not rush into voting."
Diana: "Charlie claims to be the detective and accuses Alice. Alice denies it and says Charlie is lying. I don't have any information to go on. What do you all think?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
